items.title: Judge says FTC investigation into Media Matters ‘should alarm all Americans’
items.description: A federal judge has blocked the FTC's investigation into Media Matters research around advertising and antisemitic content on X.

items.title: AI-powered stuffed animals are coming for your kids
items.description: Do A.I. chatbots packaged inside cute-looking plushies offer a viable alternative to screen time for kids? Maybe not.

items.title: Anthropic says some Claude models can now end ‘harmful or abusive’ conversations
items.description: Anthropic says new capabilities allow its latest AI models to protect themselves by ending abusive conversations.

items.title: Winklevoss twins’ crypto company Gemini files for IPO
items.description: Another crypto company is headed for the public markets.

items.title: Sam Altman, over bread rolls, explores life after GPT-5
items.description: At a dinner with reporters in San Francisco, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman spilled details on the company's ambitions beyond ChatGPT.
